title: Pump
description: The Pump element is a reference to a Light Source. It is used as a sub-Element of a Laser element to specify the Light Source for this Laser's pump (if any).

subCategoriesOrder.Pump: The Pump element is a reference to a Light Source. It is used as a sub-Element of a Laser element to specify the Light Source for this Laser's pump (if any).

ID.description: This is the Unique Identifier of the Light Source used in this case.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
